GSD.description:
mmc: host: Return an error when ->enable_sdio_irq() ops is missing

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit b6283cc505cfc7f23c9d6e062a948e0455e35270. For more details please see the references link.
